Full of cheaters. I know, they were since CS creation, but comparing with 2015 when I bought CSGO and what it has become now... Only swear words pop into my mind. OFFICIAL MM and you play against cheaters, because EVERYONE can have prime account now. Saddest thing is that ban system doesn`t work at all, this is the reason that there are more and more of them.
      Used to play against another "looking at the ground" insta 5 headshots piece of *something* with auto sniper rifle. Guess what? His account is NOT banned yet. 4 (four) years have passed.
Das Spiel ist sehr gut, nur sind die ganzen Hacker einfach ein sehr großer Störfaktor

trustfactor I dont know how it works but they should try to fix it and get rit of cheaters like make vac a better system or use more of your money valve in trying to make it a better game instead of only wanting to earn money. Listen to the community stop being so fucking selfish with your money and make csgo back to what it is supossed to be a fun 5v5 shooter without any hackers.
